Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{3: 'As the real-time rescue simulation system powers down, Bridget stands breathless in the training arena.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: '—Bridget, what were you doing just now?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Ma'am! I was carrying out a rescue mission!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "...That's not my question.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'This is not the procedure specified in the multi-party rescue protocol.', 4: '1'}

{3: "According to Support Force's multi-party rescue protocol, priority should be given to individuals with higher survival rates, making tactical choices when necessary. That's not what you just did..."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'I concluded that I had enough strength left to save another group of refugees.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "You concluded? I doubt you even went through that process—there wasn't even enough time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: '...Haha, you caught me.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The brown-haired girl scratches her head in embarrassment.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'In real combat, even the slightest mistake in your controls would kill you—not just the fragile refugees.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Much to Trojan's dismay, seeing Bridget put herself in danger stirs an unusual feeling of anxiety in her."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'But I successfully rescued all of them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "My mother told me that when we are in a crisis, we don't choose who to save—we should first resolve the crisis.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Even if your choices kill you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Even if my choices kill me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I'd love to give you the perfect answer, but you act at the drop of a hat before you can think.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Trojan lets out yet another sigh.'}
{3: 'In the few days here with Support Force, she has sighed more times than she did in the entire year.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "No one wants to be part of the ones that get abandoned. That's why, I'll always try to save everyone, as long as I can still move.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "That's the rescuer's code I've set for myself.", 4: '2'}
{3: "The young girl meets Trojan's gaze without a hint of fear."}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: '...Whatever works for you.', 4: '1'}
{3: "She can't change Bridget now, but it doesn't matter. Sooner or later, the world will teach this radiant girl some harsh lessons."}
{3: 'Trojan quickly scribbles her evaluation on the notebook as these dark thoughts linger in her mind.'}
{3: "The only one to achieve a perfect score in Support Force's recruit training."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory648.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'Huh... What?! This is crazy!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'So this is... how it feels to move as a normal Construct?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'How do you feel?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: "So this is why... It wasn't because I was too weak at all...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Ruolin finally musters the courage to tell the frame maintenance staff about her past condition with Bridget's encouragement."}

{1: '1', 2: 'Staff', 3: "I see... Yes, you have a point. Very few can achieve frame compatibility after terminal illness, so we haven't really refined our adjustment protocols for such cases...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{3: "The staff runs tests and readjusts Ruolin's frame components and calibration parameters. When Ruolin returns to training, her performance improves dramatically."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: "...This doesn't really help my cover mission, but... Whatever.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Trojan casually scrolls through her terminal in the shadows before focusing her attention on the two young women helping each other in the training arena.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "Hey, that move—you've got it all wrong...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She hesitates but finally decides to give a warning.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Hmm... Like this?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: "Actually... Never mind. I'll show you how it's done.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Trojan sets down her terminal with a weary sigh and strolls into the light.'}
